flavorText: "We outnumber them! Charge! Charge! Hey, where'd you guys go? Retreat! Retreat!"

foreignData.name: Rückzug
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Bringe dann eine weitere Kreatur Deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück, wenn deren Beherrscher nicht 1 bezahlt.

name: Withdraw
originalText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays o1.

rulings.text: The creature’s controller gets the option to pay when the spell resolves.
The two creatures may have different controllers.
You choose on announcement which creature is the one that can be paid to prevent the effect. The payment itself is made on resolution (if at all).

text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
